data.comment: Today's referee, Ryuji Sato, has blown to start the match.
Oita to take a throw-in in Yokohama Marinos territory.
In the minute 1, Ryuji Sato awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Oita at Nissan Stadium.
Oita awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Oita.
In the minute 9, Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Oita in their own half.
Oita push upfield but Ryuji Sato quickly pulls them for offside.
Yokohama Marinos have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 12, Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Oita.
Free kick for Oita in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
In the minute 15, Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos close to the penalty box.
Yokohama Marinos needs to be cautious. Oita have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 19, Corner awarded to Oita.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Yokohama.
Yokohama Marinos have a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Oita awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Oita.
Ball safe as Yokohama Marinos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 24, Ball goes out of play for a Oita goal kick.
In Yokohama a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
In the minute 28, Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Goal kick for Oita at Nissan Stadium.
Ryuji Sato awards Yokohama Marinos a goal kick.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Oita.
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
Ryuji Sato signals a throw-in for Yokohama Marinos, close to Oita's area.
In the minute 32, Ball safe as Yokohama Marinos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Takuya Wada of Yokohama Marinos smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Takuya Kida for Yokohama Marinos has been booked by Ryuji Sato and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Oita in their own half.
Throw-in Yokohama Marinos.
Goal kick for Oita at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 38, Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Oita in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Oita in Yokohama.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 39, Can Oita capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Yokohama Marinos's half?
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos close to the penalty box.
Throw-in high up the field for Yokohama Marinos in Yokohama.
In the minute 42, Yokohama Marinos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos needs to be cautious. Oita have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Oita.
Yokohama Marinos awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Nissan Stadium the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Free kick Oita.
Eitaro Matsuda for Yokohama Marinos gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Yokohama.
In the minute 45, Ryuji Sato blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway in Yokohama.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Oita at Nissan Stadium.
Ryuji Sato awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Oita in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 48, In Yokohama a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Yokohama Marinos have a goal kick.
Yokohama Marinos are pushing forward but Ken Matsubara's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 49, Ryuji Sato awards Oita a goal kick.
Can Yokohama Marinos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Oita's half?
Throw-in Oita.
In the minute 55, Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
Goal! Yokohama Marinos have got their heads in front thanks to a Ken Matsubara strike.
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
In the minute 60, Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Ryuji Sato signals a Oita throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half.
Kei Chinen is replacing Yamato Machida for the away team.
In the minute 61, Oita have a dangerous throw-in.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Oita.
Can Oita capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Yokohama Marinos's half?
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Oita in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama Marinos goal kick.
Ryuji Sato signals a Oita throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half.
In the minute 65, Goal! Junior Santos extends Yokohama Marinos's lead to 2-0.
Ado Onaiwu instrumental with a fine assist.
Ange Postecoglou (Yokohama Marinos) is making a second substitution, with Kota Mizunuma replacing Eitaro Matsuda.
In the minute 66, Ange Postecoglou is making the team's first substitution at Nissan Stadium with Erik replacing Ado Onaiwu.
Ryuji Sato signals a throw-in for Yokohama Marinos, close to Oita's area.
Ryuji Sato awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 71, Oita make their second substitution with Rei Matsumoto replacing Yuji Hoshi.
The away team replace Naoki Nomura with Kazushi Mitsuhira.
In the minute 72, Yokohama Marinos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Oita's Kei Chinen has been booked in Yokohama.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Yokohama.
It's now 3-0 in Yokohama as Erik scores for Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for Oita at Nissan Stadium.
The home team have replaced Junior Santos with Takahiro Ogihara. This is the fourth substitution made today by Ange Postecoglou.
Edigar Junio is replacing Jun Amano for Yokohama Marinos at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 79, Ball safe as Yokohama Marinos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Oita in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos have a goal kick.
In the minute 83, Oita awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ryotaro Tsunoda is replacing Theerathon Bunmathan for Yokohama Marinos at Nissan Stadium.
Ryosuke Tone is on a sub for Yuya Takazawa for Oita.
In the minute 84, The away team replace Yushi Hasegawa with Kento Haneda.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Can Oita get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half?
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Oita close to the penalty box.
Free kick Yokohama Marinos.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 87, Goal! Yokohama Marinos extend their lead to 4-0 through Erik.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Oita to take a throw-in in Yokohama Marinos territory.
In the minute 89, Ryuji Sato awards Yokohama Marinos a goal kick.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Oita in their own half.
Throw-in Oita.
Ryuji Sato signals a throw-in for Oita, close to Yokohama Marinos's area.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Oita have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Oita in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama Marinos goal kick.
Free kick for Oita in their own half.
That's full-time at Nissan Stadium. The final score is 4-0.
